title: Person of Interest: Reese VS Grice
author: POI Fights
comment: I think John's action scenes are my favorite scenes on the show. And Jim Caviezel definitely suits that character so perfectly.
Man, this scene is so good. Thank you for uploading. I loved Grice so much, but Reese is obviously a much better fighter. I mean this was a good fight but Reese was so tired and injured.
Reese hasn't had a fight this intense since he took on Hersh back in season 2.
Before going in a revenge rampage Reese should really treat those wounds, first carter and now Shaw, I’m beginning to see a pattern
The IRS assassin was the hardest fight for Reese, especially since Reese lost and got thrown through a window. The episode "Ghosts"
description: Fight Scene from S04 X 12: Control-Alt-Delete
